name: flight-above
description: A Mac menu bar app that displays current flights overhead

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.dist:manual: npm run build && npm run package:all && npm run dmg:create
scripts.package:all: npm run package:x64 && npm run package:arm64
scripts.dmg:create: npm run dmg:x64 && npm run dmg:arm64
scripts.dmg:x64: mkdir -p release/dmg && cp -r release/FlightAbove-darwin-x64/FlightAbove.app release/dmg/ && hdiutil create -volname 'FlightAbove' -srcfolder release/dmg -ov -format UDZO release/FlightAbove-1.0.1.dmg
scripts.dmg:arm64: mkdir -p release/dmg-arm64 && cp -r release/FlightAbove-darwin-arm64/FlightAbove.app release/dmg-arm64/ && hdiutil create -volname 'FlightAbove' -srcfolder release/dmg-arm64 -ov -format UDZO release/FlightAbove-1.0.1-arm64.dmg
scripts.fix-deps: node -e "try { require('fs').rmSync('node_modules/flightradarapi/node_modules', { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Fixed flightradarapi dependencies'); } catch(e) { console.log('No nested node_modules to fix'); }"

author: Louis Leng
